UniprotID	P21673
Accession	P21673;Q6ICU9
EntryName	SAT1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Diamine acetyltransferase 1 (EC 2.3.1.57) (Polyamine N-acetyltransferase 1) (Putrescine acetyltransferase) (Spermidine/spermine N(1)-acetyltransferase 1) (SSAT) (SSAT-1)
GeneName	SAT1 SAT
Length	171
Function	Enzyme which catalyzes the acetylation of polyamines (PubMed:15283699, PubMed:16455797, PubMed:17516632). Substrate specificity: norspermidine = spermidine >> spermine > N(1)-acetylspermine (PubMed:17516632). This highly regulated enzyme allows a fine attenuation of the intracellular concentration of polyamines (PubMed:16455797). Also involved in the regulation of polyamine transport out of cells (PubMed:16455797). Also acts on 1,3-diaminopropane and 1,5-diaminopentane (PubMed:16455797, PubMed:17516632).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol
Disorder	0.0235,0.0244,0.0414,0.0300,0.0414,0.0631,0.0389,0.0253,0.0327,0.0231,0.0178,0.0235,0.0334,0.0205,0.0356,0.0543,0.0494,0.0592,0.0258,0.0240,0.0258,0.0380,0.0518,0.0306,0.0275,0.0168,0.0165,0.0320,0.0568,0.0631,0.0618,0.0618,0.0734,0.0676,0.1184,0.0690,0.0719,0.1501,0.1275,0.2399,0.1759,0.0888,0.0749,0.0405,0.0364,0.0414,0.0592,0.0646,0.0356,0.0424,0.0380,0.0780,0.1298,0.0568,0.0555,0.0662,0.1528,0.1528,0.1298,0.1349,0.0690,0.0967,0.1671,0.0888,0.1184,0.1476,0.1251,0.0851,0.0349,0.0581,0.0258,0.0281,0.0294,0.0163,0.0188,0.0181,0.0153,0.0094,0.0070,0.0054,0.0042,0.0057,0.0073,0.0050,0.0050,0.0046,0.0046,0.0060,0.0086,0.0092,0.0088,0.0134,0.0079,0.0073,0.0080,0.0109,0.0107,0.0120,0.0123,0.0123,0.0198,0.0364,0.0191,0.0174,0.0380,0.0531,0.0662,0.0662,0.0646,0.0372,0.0676,0.0433,0.0424,0.0909,0.0646,0.1048,0.0483,0.0294,0.0178,0.0240,0.0473,0.0240,0.0244,0.0473,0.0581,0.0518,0.0463,0.0618,0.0389,0.0223,0.0334,0.0334,0.0518,0.0531,0.0443,0.0592,0.0676,0.0817,0.1298,0.1791,0.2224,0.2193,0.3356,0.2094,0.1881,0.1028,0.0506,0.0835,0.0443,0.1028,0.1731,0.1969,0.1184,0.0719,0.0398,0.0473,0.0341,0.0258,0.0473,0.0555,0.0646,0.0454,0.0306,0.0235,0.0414,0.0320,0.0494,0.1092,0.0851,0.1476,0.1007
